title: How Stego Got His Groove Back (Dinosaur Erotica)
features: A sexy geologist. A lonely stegosaur. Sometimes to find love you have to break all the rules...
Beautiful geologist Annabelle struggles with human connection. But when she finds herself assigned to a quarry worked by a crew of revivified dinosaurs, she discovers it may not be a
connection she's searching for after all.This is a 5000 word short story.
Warning: explicit dinosaur love action is NOT for children!Advance Praise from Goodreads critics:
This might be the most ridiculous thing I have ever read in my entire life.
Lola are you okay, genuinely concerned anyones thought this much about how sex with dinosaurs would work.
Honestly how can you not love this
If you want more hot steamy dinos, check out Lola Faust's other dinosaur erotica, including Wet Hot Allosaurus Summer, Dino Stud, and Mile High Pterodactyl Club.
description: From an early age Lola Faust's fantasies and reveries tilted towards the baroque, the unusual, and the eccentric. Though she entertained curious private journals, it wasn't until she entered the Paleontology program at the University of British Columbia that her fantastic and romantic notions concerning dinosaurs took full flight.While working towards her doctorate, Ms Faust began writing her signature saurian prose. Today she is employed by day at a leading university in her field, but maintains her anonymous and risque personality online.
